mapper.select: SELECT po.post_id, po.star_ratio, po.post_name, po.sale_ratio, po.whole_price, po.shipping_info1, po.po_category, po.po_subcate, s.company_name, pimg.photo_url FROM product_posting po INNER JOIN seller s ON po.post_sellerid = s.seller_id inner join user_scrap u on u.sc_postid = po.post_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT photo_id, photo_postid, photo_url FROM product_image WHERE (photo_id, photo_postid) IN ( SELECT MIN(photo_id) AS photo_id, photo_postid FROM product_image GROUP BY photo_postid ) ) pimg ON po.post_id = pimg.photo_postid;
SELECT sc_postid FROM user_scrap WHERE sc_usernum=#{sc_usernum};
